description: The visual cycle, also known as the retinoid cycle metabolic pathway, regenerates vitamin A derived chromophore 11-cis retinal.  This enables visual phototransduction response to light.  Inspired by [rgd.mcw.edu/rgdweb/pathway/pathwayRecord.html?acc_id=PW:0001005](https://rgd.mcw.edu/rgdweb/pathway/pathwayRecord.html?acc_id=PW:0001005).
title: Visual cycle
